name: Cave runner (itch) (IvanTrujillo)
description: It is time to go home after a long day of cave diving. Unfortunately, your original path caved in and you're forced to go through an unmapped section of the cave. This part must have some history to it what with all the ancient traps and grim reapers lurking around. You have some medicine so you can survive some hits but you only have a limited supply, so get out in one piece, and good luck
